 UTimerEv (ccallback_type handler, void *arg=0)

Detailed Description

template<>
class UTimerEv< ccallback_type >

This is the specialization of UTimerEv for C-style callbacks.

Note:
This event can't PERSIST.
See also:
UTimerEv
